description: This is what happens when a beautiful chocolate brownie and a handsome can of chickpeas have a secret love child……Yes it’s Dessert Chocolate Hummus….Yes it is amazingly delicious….And yes dessert hummus is a thing!
keywords: chocolate hummus, dessert hummus, sweet hummus, vegan chocolate hummus
name: Dessert Chocolate Hummus
recipeIngredient: 2 cups | 1 540ml can cooked chickpeas drained and rinsed well
1/2 cup | 100g chocolate chips (I like to use semi-sweet but you can use whatever you have)
1/4 cup + 2 tablespoons | 6 tablespoons maple syrup (see recipe note)
1/4 - 3/4 cup | 4 - 12 tablespoons non-dairy milk (, add as much milk as necessary to get it to the texture you like. )

recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the ingredients except the milk to a food processor or high powered blender.

Process until everything is broken down then start adding the milk gradually while blending. Add as much as you need to get the consistency that is right for you. I used 1/4 cup but you might prefer slightly more or less. Keep blending until it is completely smooth.
Store in a sealed container in the fridge.

video.description: This is what happens when a beautiful chocolate brownie and a handsome can of chickpeas have a secret love child……Yes it’s Brownie Batter Dessert Hummus….Yes it is amazingly delicious….And yes dessert hummus is a thing!
video.name: Brownie Batter Dessert Hummus
